result.eng: Not many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.
result.ga: níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa pharlaimint

result.eng: I only have an antenna, therefore I only have RTÉ1, RTÉ2, and TG4 at home.
